scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,worker,web -c cyan,magenta,green "pnpm -C apps/api dev" "pnpm -C apps/worker dev" "pnpm -C apps/web dev"
scripts.build: pnpm -C apps/api build && pnpm -C apps/worker build && pnpm -C apps/web build
scripts.lint: pnpm -C apps/api lint && pnpm -C apps/worker lint && pnpm -C apps/web lint
scripts.type-check: pnpm -C apps/api type-check && pnpm -C apps/worker type-check && pnpm -C apps/web type-check
